page.title: 02MY TOWN ,RIPLEY
page.content: Ripley is quite a large town but there are hardly any factories or places for men to work.Most women stay in Ripley to work but most men go out of the town.I think it is a busy town with many shops.There isn't much countryside in Ripley it has all been taken away to make roads or for the opencast mines.Ripley has two main parks Crossley Park and the Barnes Wallace Park that has only a few swings and a slide .My favourite building is Shirley Road School built in 1915 but I don't like the new buildings like Kwik Save and the Co-op Pricefighters.The only places in Ripley for the whole family to go to is the Leisure Centre and the Cinema.I go to the park quite often.Even though there aren't a lot of things to do in Ripley I don't want to change anything.
